Arcane Cascade: Puppet String.name: Arcane Cascade: Puppet String
Arcane Cascade: Puppet String.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell that targeted an enemy within 30 feet or make a melee Spellstrike and the spell you chose had the illusion or mental trait.

Grants

  • To You @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-effects.Item.D2ZV2vHptH3jsfzr]{Effect: Arcane Cascade: Puppet String}
  • To Enemies @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-effects.Item.ub4NOlXIkOJtUUpR]{Effect: Tethered (Puppet String)}

You weave magic around your enemy, making them more susceptible to mental manipulation. You create a thread of magic between yourself and the required enemy, tethering them by a puppet string made from the lingering magic of your spell. This puppet string is broken if a creature spends an Interact action to break it or you and the tethered creature are further than 30 feet from each other. While tethered, your target takes a –1 status penalty to their Will saves against your spells with the required traits and they gain weakness 1 to mental damage from your spells. This weakness increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization, or 3 if you have greater weapon specialization.

Arcane Cascade: Slidecast.name: Arcane Cascade: Slidecast
Arcane Cascade: Slidecast.description:
Trigger You Cast a Spell with a somatic component that takes at least two actions to cast.

When you Cast a Spell, you use the momentum of your magic to propel you. You Step. You can perform this Step during a Spellstrike between when you Cast the Spell and when you Strike, but your Step must be towards the target of your Spellstrike or to a square that keeps the target in your reach if you were already within melee reach of the target.

Arcane Cascade: Spell Ignition.name: Arcane Cascade: Spell Ignition
Arcane Cascade: Spell Ignition.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell that targets a creature or area of effect or to make a melee Spellstrike.

@UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.8hDxA1fJYbc82SbB]{You cause ambient magic in the area to burn}, making the air thick with palpable magic. This creates an area of ambient magic that lasts for 2 rounds. The area of ambient magic occupies the target’s space or the area of effect of the spell you cast. Creatures other than you that end their turn within an area of ambient magic take damage equal to the level of the spell you cast with a  @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC, or half that amount if the spell you cast was a cantrip (minimum 1). This damage is of the same type as the arcane cascade stance. The ambient magic lasts for 3 rounds if you have weapon specialization, or 4 rounds if you have greater weapon specialization.

Arcane Cascade+.name: 奥术奔涌+ Arcane Cascade+
Arcane Cascade+.description:
需求 你最近的一个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast a Spell}或进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{法术打击 Spellstrike}。只需在进入架势时满足此要求，而非保持架势。

你转换一部分法术的魔法力量并通过使用特化的架势、吐纳和步法，让其在你的躯体和武器间循环。 当你处于架势中时，你的近战打击造成1点额外力场伤害。如果你具有武器专精，这个伤害增加到2。如果你具有高等武器专精，则增加到3。任何受益于此的打击都获得奥术特征，使其魔法化。

如果你进入架势前最近的法术是可以造成伤害的法术，来自于架势给与的额外伤害改为和这个法术相同的伤害类型（如果法术可以造成多种类型的伤害，则选择一种类型）。

Arcane Cascade: Don Visage.name: Arcane Cascade: Don Visage
Arcane Cascade: Don Visage.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action to Cast a Spell or make a melee Spellstrike.

You don your visage, granting you a fearsome, jovial, or mysterious demeanor. Choose between fearsome, jovial, or mysterious for the demeanor of your visage and attempt an @Check[type:arcana|dc:@self.level] check at a standard-difficulty DC of your level to don your visage. If you succeed at your check, you don your visage for 3 rounds, or 4 rounds if your result was a critical success. When you first use Don Visage in an encounter, you can use the result of your initial check to perform the associated skill action of your demeanor against an appropriate creature. For the duration, you can use your visage to perform the associated actions with your Arcana instead of the normal skill. You deal 1 additional damage of the same type as the arcane cascade stance to creatures as long as they are affected by the associated action from your visage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization or to 3 if you have greater weapon specialization.

  • Fearsome Your skill action is @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.0CUA0IoROLfIKCEq]{Demoralize}. When you use your visage to Demoralize it gains the visual trait and loses the linguistic and auditory traits.
  • Jovial Your skill action is @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.KeRdZBkxJGLLYhTN]{Bon Mot}, and you can use Bon Mot even if you do not have the skill feat. It gains the visual trait and loses the linguistic and auditory traits, but your opponent only needs to use a single action with the concentrate trait to retort.
  • Mysterious Your skill actions are @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.ktRy5et6OdHTO4vN]{Feint}, @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.7gPdrGtDD8eh51kr]{Hide}, and @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.uSOQA4j55M11rK4k]{Sneak}. You gain the additional damage from Don Visage against creatures that are off-guard to you as a result of these actions or being undetected or unnoticed.

Havok Cascade.name: Havok Cascade
Havok Cascade.description:
Requirements You can enter this stance if your most recent action was to Cast a Spell or make a Spellstrike, but you can remain in the stance even if you no longer meet the requirements.

With strained breath, you call upon the physicality of your master to aid you alongside the spells you have gained from them. When you would enter your @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-class-features.Item.SkUkDSnIU1LHBSHf]{Arcane Cascade} stance, you enter a Havok Cascade stance, a powerful enhancement to your bolstered essences that follows all the same rules as your Arcane Cascade, but with the additional effects of your Bargained Essences. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-focus-spells.Item.guBfgKLR7YYnfFbi]{Wreak Havok} conflux cantrip.

While you are in the Havok Cascade stance, you can use actions with the havok trait and when you use these actions you take [[/r @actor.level]]{damage equal to your level}. If you resist this damage, remove it, or otherwise avoid taking it, your havok action automatically fails and has no effect.

Residual Spellstrike.name: Residual Spellstrike
Residual Spellstrike.description:
Trigger You got a failure on the Strike of your Spellstrike with one of your diametric weapons and your Strike did not have the fortune trait.

Requirements You are wielding your other diametric weapon.

You retain the magical energy by having it surge through your body to your other weapon. Make a Strike with your other diametric weapon, but the attack is at a –5 multiple attack penalty (or –4 if the weapon is agile) instead of its normal penalty. If this Strike hits, you apply the effects of the required Spellstrike to your Strike.
